tool_description: Get Instant, Raw Search Insights, Direct From The Minds Of Your Customer from this API.
name: Answer The Public
title: Answer The Public

api_list.name: Simple
api_list.description: Get Instant, Raw Search Insights, Direct From The Minds Of Your Customer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://answer-the-public1.p.rapidapi.com/general/google"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "answer-the-public1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
